summary: On 9/11 2001 two planes American 11 united 175 hit the World Trade Center and many people died and jumped to their deaths some survived until the tower fell.
cast: Terence Stamp|Hong Zhu|Jay Jonas|Al Smith|Jan Demczur|Paul De Martini|Rick Bryan|Stella Olender|Stanley Praimnath|Dianne DeFontes|Brian Clark|Jack Gentul|Rebecca Clemento|Nina De Martini|Josephine Harris|Thomas Kean|William Hope|Robert Ashe|François Chau|Stuart Milligan|Denica Fairman|Teddy Kempner|Sakalas Uzdavinys|John Wesley|Serge Soric|Nate Reese|Robert Jezek|Richard Laing|Miquel Brown|Trevor White|Charlotte Comer|Laurel Lefkow|Anthony Edridge|Alibe Parsons|Debora Weston|Andrius Zebrauskas|Suzette Llewellyn|Eleanor Matsuura|Paul DuBois|Aleksas Kazanavicius|Peter Kloeppel|Antanas Surgailis
title: 11S: Lo que ocurrió dentro
